title: Visualization of Bostonian Biking Traffic
description: Employed MapBox and D3 to create an interactive, dynamic map of Boston's biking traffic to visualize its arrivals and departures throughout a 24-hour period

title: Visualization of Grocery Products Data
description: Developed a data visualization of grocery products to portray the "organicness" (NOVA classifications) of various grocery stores' selections (visualization was placed in the top 3% of a 180-student class)

title: "Woking" With Data: EDA of Food Recipes & Reviews
description: Conducted data analysis on food recipes and their respective food reviews to frame a regression problem and train a functional predictive model

title: Netflix Show Recommender
description: Utilizing user inputs for media watch history and personal media preferences to recommend what to watch on Netflix

title: MTS Transit: EDA of SD's Public Transportation
description: Utilized San Diego's MTS bus network to trace optimized bus paths, plot wait times, and uncover the Waiting Time Paradox

title: Loan Applications: EDA of the LendingClub's Loans
description: Accessed the LendingClub's historical dataset of loans to understand Simpson's Paradoxes and lender's decision-making

title: NGramLM
description: Trained a uniform, unigram, and ngram language model to generate new text and establish an understanding of the B.T.S. of language models

title: Image Processing Program
description: A series of Python methods that can access individual pixels within an image and modify accordingly i.e. rotate 180 degrees, blur appearance, adjust brightness, etc.

title: Visualization of Trade in Low Carbon Technology
description: Mixed deceptive and earnest tactics to persuade viewers on a specified propostion regarding global trade balances of technology geared for climate change

title: League of Legends Chatbot
description: Functional end-to-end chatbot that gives in-game item suggestions to League of Legends players based on inputted keywords
